Title: NSynx
Description:
NSynx is an integration application that enables you to send, retrieve data from multiples sources and let them connect each other by defining a set of work-flow statements.

The current planing contains an implementation of a flow engine that executes/evaluates actions.
These actions could be a control flow , a data transformation  or a auditing/logging step.

The development has just started , thus do not expect much implementation on the following days/week and don't forget that your opinions are very important. Hence if you have any thoughts , please don't hesitate to drop couple of words.

I do not eager to implement flows using Windows Workflow Foundation in the near future.

Project Description
NSynx is an integration application that enables you to send, retrieve data from multiples sources and let them connect each other by defining a set of work-flow statements.

The current planing contains an implementation of a flow engine that executes/evaluates actions.
These actions could be a control flow , a data transformation or a auditing/logging step.

The development has just started , thus do not expect much implementation on the following days/week and don't forget that your opinions are very important. Hence if you have any thoughts , please don't hesitate to drop couple of words.

I do not eager to implement flows using Windows Workflow Foundation in the near future.
